title: Short-Intensive Course for Applying Online Qualitative Research Methodologies

context.additional_context: Professional Development for In-Service Teachers Targeting Qualitative Research Method Application in Mathematics Education, with TPACK-Framework-Based Integration of Technology, Pedagogy, and Content Knowledge

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three theoretical concepts through qualitative research case analysis on LMS-based discussion boards
Learners can write qualitative research designs applicable to mathematics education settings according to the TPACK framework
Learners can finalize research proposal drafts incorporating peer evaluation and feedback using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
